      • getNumberOf

        public java.lang.String getNumberOf(java.lang.String region,
                                    java.lang.String type)
        Perform a XML query (XPath query) on the covid19spreading.rdf and get the String of total number of the type given in the given region.
        Parameters:
        region - the region (e.g. Algarve).
        type - the type (e.g. Testes).
        Returns:
        the String of total number of the type given in the given region.

      • getRegions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRegions()
        Perform a XML query (XPath query) on the covid19spreading.rdf and get the list of Strings of existing regions.
        Returns:
        the list of String of existing regions.

      • getTotalOr

        public java.lang.String getTotalOr(java.lang.String t1,
                                   java.lang.String t2)
        Perform a XML query (XPath query) on the covid19spreading.rdf and get the disjunction of the total number of the two types given.
        Parameters:
        t1 - the first type (e.g. Testes).
        t2 - the second type (e.g. Internamentos).
        Returns:
        the total number of the disjunction of the two types given.

      • getRegionsWhere

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRegionsWhere(java.lang.String type,
                                                        java.lang.String operator,
                                                        java.lang.String value)
        Perform a XML query (XPath query) on the covid19spreading.rdf and get the list of all regions where condition formed by the type, relational operator and value is verified (e.g. Testes greater than 20).
        Parameters:
        type - the type (e.g. Testes).
        operator - the relational operator (greater than, less than).
        value - the number of type given.
        Returns:
        the list of all regions where condition formed by the type, operator and value is verified.
